history.wish: I wish to go from really evil to just normal evil. Is that okay santa?
history.reason: i can not change who you are as a person, koolioguy! you wishing for me to make such changes to even your self is a rather naughty wish indeed.

i see here that koolioguy has wished for a wishy washy! i am rather confused about what exactly they want, though it seems like they want to be wishy washy! that is a rather naughty wish indeed as its requesting for changing things well outside my control.
